mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id userId, u.username, u.password, u.email, u.mobile, u. STATUS, u.create_time createTime, u.ssex, d.dept_id deptId, d.dept_name deptName, u.AVATAR, u.DESCRIPTION, u.parent_id parentId, u.user_type userType, u.vender_id venderId, u.LAST_LOGIN_TIME lastLoginTime, GROUP_CONCAT(r.role_id) roleId, GROUP_CONCAT(r.ROLE_NAME) roleName FROM t_user u LEFT JOIN t_dept d ON (u.dept_id = d.dept_id) LEFT JOIN t_user_role ur ON (u.user_id = ur.user_id) LEFT JOIN t_role r ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE u.username = #{username} group by u.username
